name: My IceCream Shop - Frozen Desserts Cupcakes
name_original: My IceCream Shop - Frozen Desserts Cupcakes
description:
Heyy Ice Cream Lovers!!! This game is made for you guys. The ice cream shop involves a variety of ice cream cones, scoop ice cream cup, 

Cup cakes, pastries, cookies, pie, donuts, candies, juice, cold drinks and so many tasty toppings. You need to serve the ice cream as per customer's requirement. 
Use boosters to have a fantastic gameplay, face the difficulties to achieve the level targets and many rewards are waiting for you. So play this game and enjoy an 
awesome gameplay experience. Don't forget to share this game with your friends and family.

Key Features:
Make a wide range of ice creams and desserts in your shop
Decorate the ice cream with tasty toppings
Complete the achievement and claim rewards
Hit the target to complete the level
Use boosters to spice up your gameplay experience
Different play areas in a single game
